about_the_game:
TimeLab

Experience the future of learning and adventure with TimeLab – your knowledge and experience platform for virtual time travel! Immerse yourself in a futuristic world where you can visit historical moments and places with a time simulator.

Features:

  • Lab: Discover and activate data modules to immerse yourself in significant moments in history. Optionally, the data modules can be selected and activated via a conventional menu.
  • Education and Entertainment: Each data module offers an informative time travel experience, along with a game, a quiz, and a detailed introduction to make learning fun.
  • Free Content: Two data modules are already included – experience the first manned moon landing and explore “Falkenstein,” an unrealized castle of King Ludwig II.
Are you ready to experience history up close and in an exciting way? Download TimeLab and start your interactive journey through time today!

name: TimeLab

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (x64)
  • Processor: Core i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR compatible headsets
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (x64)
  • Processor: Core i7-6700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR compatible headsets

short_description: Experience the future of learning and adventure with TimeLab – your knowledge and experience platform for virtual time travel! Immerse yourself in a futuristic world where you can visit historical moments and places with a time simulator.
